name: houndoominite
effect: Held: Allows Houndoom to Mega Evolve into Mega Houndoom.
short_effect: Held: Allows Houndoom to Mega Evolve into Mega Houndoom.

flavor_text.x-y: One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones. Have Houndoom hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
